title: Terraforming Mars
good: Satisfying, slow burn engine building with a knife fight finish.
bad: Small number arithmetic isn't your idea of fun.
You're looking for lots of player interaction. Even compared to other euros, Terraforming Mars feels solitary.
note: Everyone will be responsible for lots of fiddly bits, and piles of cards.
The theme is slick, and well incorporated with the game, but may wear thin after multiple plays.
